thread.title: Silicon Valley Leaders Slam Trump Refugee Order

author: Anita Balakrishnan, CNBC and Harriet Taylor, CNBC
title: Silicon Valley Leaders Slam Trump Refugee Order

organizations.name: silicon valley leaders slam trump refugee order facebook

text: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg speaks at the company's headquarters in Menlo Park, Calif., Thursday, April 4, 2013. The company says it is not building a phone or an operating system. Rather, Facebook is introducing a new experience for Android phones. The idea behind the new Home service is to bring content right to you, rather than require people to check apps on the device. (AP Photo/Marcio Jose Sanchez)
